description.fr: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Si un adversaire est adjacent à aux moins 2 Rats, il subit {magicalDamage:dmg}.
description.en: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} If an opponent is adjacent to at least 2\_Rats,they take {magicalDamage:dmg}.
description.es: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Si un adversario está adyacente a al menos 2 ratas, sufre {magicalDamage:dmg}.
description.de: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Grenzt ein Gegner an mindestens 2 Ratten an, erleidet er {magicalDamage:dmg}.
description.pt: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Se um adversário estiver adjacente a 2 Ratos ou mais, ele sofre {magicalDamage:dmg}.
